channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ UCLouvain on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Boosting Vision-Language Models with Transduction
item.description: TransCLIP significantly boosts vision-language model accuracy by efficiently integrating transduction, a powerful learning paradigm that leverages the structure of unlabeled data.

item.title: The Selective $G$-Bispectrum and its Inversion: Applications to $G$-Invariant Networks
item.description: This paper introduces a selective G-Bispectrum algorithm, slashing the computational complexity from O(|G|^2) to O(|G|), making G-invariant deep learning faster and more scalable.
